MS.S: PowerShell argument completer for popular command line tools. Supports_x000D__x000A_both tab-expansion and PSReadLine plugin._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_# Supported Command Line Tools_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- conda_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_If a tools is not supported then please consider helping develop the syntax tree file_x000D__x000A_needed to support it. Further information is available in the developer documentation._x000D__x000A_https://posh-predictive-text.readthedocs.io/en/latest/pages/development.html_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## Installing / Getting started_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_PoshPredictiveText requires PowerShell version 7.2 or greater, and PSReadLine version 2.6 or_x000D__x000A_greater._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Install-Module -name PoshPredictiveText_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Add the following commands to the PowerShell profile. To locate the PowerShell profile open_x000D__x000A_a command prompt and type $PROFILE._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Set-PredictiveTextOption -RemoveCondaTabExpansion_x000D__x000A_Install-PredictiveText_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_The first command needed to remove the tab-expansion code automatically and silently installed_x000D__x000A_by conda. The conda code prevents Posh Predictive Text from providing completions. The second_x000D__x000A_command installs Posh Predictive Text._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Further settings are described on the project website._x000D__x000A_https://posh-predictive-text.readthedocs.io
